mapper.insert: insert into event(event_ID, event_Title,event_Content,event_Up,event_Down, event_When, event_Picture,category_ID,location_ID, user_ID, event_Hit) values(#{event_ID},#{event_Title},#{event_Content}, #{event_When},#{event_Picture},#{category_ID},#{location_ID}, #{user_ID})
mapper.update: update event set event_Title = #{event_Title}, event_Content = #{event_Content}, event_Up = #{event_Up}, event_Down = #{event_Down}, event_When = #{event_When}, event_Picture = #{event_Picture}, category_ID = #{catetory_ID}, location_ID = #{location_ID}, user_ID = #{user_ID}, event_Hit = #{event_Hit} where event_ID = #{event_ID}
mapper.select: select *,(6371*acos(cos(radians(#{lat}))*cos(radians(lat))*cos(radians(lon) -radians(#{lon}))+sin(radians(#{lat}))*sin(radians(lat)))) as distance from event having distance <= #{distance} order by distance limit 0,300
